trans-unit.source: Provides a set of <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> methods that extend the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> class.
trans-unit.target: Innehåller en uppsättning <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""> </xref> metoder som utökar <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>klass.</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: The methods in this class are defined as extension methods that extend the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoderna i den här klassen har definierats som tilläggsmetoder som utökar <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>klass.</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: This means that they can be called like an instance method on any <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> object.
trans-unit.target: Det innebär att de kan anropas som en instansmetod på någon <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>objektet.</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: The methods in this class operate on <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> objects that are associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoderna i den här klassen fungerar på <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>objekt som är associerade med en <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: Waits indefinitely for the underlying <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref> to complete.
trans-unit.target: Väntar på obestämd tid den underliggande <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"> </xref> att slutföra.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.TaskExtensions.IsDispatcherOperationTask%2A> method to check whether the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> before you call this method.
trans-unit.target: Anropa den <xref:System.Windows.Threading.TaskExtensions.IsDispatcherOperationTask%2A>metod för att kontrollera om den <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>är associerad med en <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>innan du anropar den här metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> </xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.TaskExtensions.IsDispatcherOperationTask%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is not associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref>.
Waits for the specified amount of time for the underlying <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref> to complete.
trans-unit.target: Väntar på att den angivna mängden tid för den underliggande <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"> </xref> att slutföra.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.TaskExtensions.IsDispatcherOperationTask%2A> method to check whether the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> before you call this method.
trans-unit.target: Anropa den <xref:System.Windows.Threading.TaskExtensions.IsDispatcherOperationTask%2A>metod för att kontrollera om den <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>är associerad med en <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>innan du anropar den här metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> </xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.TaskExtensions.IsDispatcherOperationTask%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref>.
The amount of time to wait.
The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is not associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether this <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett värde som anger om detta <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>är associerad med en <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"> </xref>.</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: `true` if the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>; otherwise, `false`.
